body_html: There is no need to pass any extra flags during build. I downloaded OpenMPI 3.0.0 source and compiled it with C++ support although C++ support is deprecated. Then pointed tensorflow to use new installation of OpenMPI. After that it compiled fine.
body_text: There is no need to pass any extra flags during build. I downloaded OpenMPI 3.0.0 source and compiled it with C++ support although C++ support is deprecated. Then pointed tensorflow to use new installation of OpenMPI. After that it compiled fine.
body: There is no need to pass any extra flags during build. I downloaded OpenMPI 3.0.0 source and compiled it with C++ support although C++ support is deprecated. Then pointed tensorflow to use new installation of OpenMPI. After that it compiled fine.
